Text: For process design I can ask about parallel sourcing and quality checks For risk management things like single points of failure and compliance challenges Decision-making questions could explore demand forecasting and rework thresholds Stakeholder questions should cover communication protocols and transparency Performance metrics need both efficiency and customer-centric measures
